sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { ContainerMoviePrincipal, ContainerMovie } from './styled' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import { goToMovie } from '../../routers/cordinator' const MoviesTop = (props) => { const history = useHistory() const onClickCard = () => goToMovie (history) return ( onClickCard(props.index.id)}> ) } export default MoviesTop
